data.message: Anyone mad at Em for this isn't even a hip hop fan to begin with... if you claim to be... newsflash, an overwhelming majority of rappers feel this way about Trump! You being a hip hop "fan" won't be missed. Gtfoh

replies.message: Try respecting other people's beliefs. I mean I respect your beliefs as a butthurt cry baby who is so triggered about but. Grow a pair why don't ya
Branden Newman WTF are you talking about?
Branden Newman it’s okay buddy, I won’t tell anyone you’re hiding your butthurt by claiming others are the crybabies.

Also, fuck the phrase “respect other people’s beliefs”. You should respect someone’s right to have their beliefs, but you don’t have to respect the beliefs themselves. I will never respect the beliefs of anyone who thinks Trump is anything but a fascist, racist, xenophobic lunatic.
